captions.shortCaption: Jason wanted a website that matched his craft: clean, precise, and timeless! Where he could point his clients to show off work, let them book appointments, and allow him to easily update.
captions.longCaption: Shut The Box is a game I developed that is both simple to play and incredibly challenging. The objective is straightforward: roll the dice, knock down the numbered tiles, and aim for the lowest score to win. It features both dark and light modes, options to share your results with friends, and new updates are frequently introduced to enhance the experience.

captions.shortCaption: LightCMS enabled users to effortlessly add images and documents to any element through this redesigned media manager. This upgrade, replacing the clunky and outdated media manager, was achieved through a comprehensive process involving research, user feedback, wireframing, iteration, coding, testing, and further refinement. The new media manager was highly praised upon its release.

captions.shortCaption: By integrating ACE Editor, we empowered users to update their site on the fly without needing a separate coding application.
LightCMS needed to streamline the store checkout process to accommodate hundreds of thousands of clients across the CMS.
The client-facing report needed a complete makeover to make essential information easily accessible at a glance
This feature enabled you to add any of the available elements to any section of your website.
NetSuite SuiteCommerce required a new site to highlight their top vendors and their solutions. The collaboration with Jordan Winn resulted in a stunning design that completely impressed NetSuite.
Element Fusion would do quarterly shirts, and this was my first design, and my all time favorite!
When users needed a question answered, they wanted direct access to the solution to address the problem efficiently.
As a LightCMS white-label partner, you needed a quick overview of your sites status at a glance.
LaGree, based in Oklahoma City, desired a new, bold, and colorful design that would highlight their expertise in selling commercial properties.
LightCMS needed a facelift to showcase more of its interface and highlight its functionality. This visual update led to approximately a 6% increase in LightCMS signups!
